title: Freaky Friday: Episode 31
description:
The Demon that Follows; My other uncle, the murderer--greetings and another tale from "Momma Sandy"; I Was Lost in the Las Vegas Backrooms; Someone was watching from not too afar....; Well I guess that makes sense...; and The Real Monster In the Bed.

Head to sinisterhood.com/freakyfriday to submit your odd but true story
